'''Zyanya''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|"Flower-Feather Clan"}}. She and [[Pixica]] run the [["Floating Target Balloon" Challenge]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Zyanya)
:'''Zyanya:''' Oh, what do you say, dear guest? Ready to start the Target Balloon challenge?
:{{DIcon}} I’m ready!
::'''Zyanya:''' Be sure to stand firm then, and take care not to fall!
:;([["Floating Target Balloon" Challenge]] begins)
:{{DIcon}} Maybe later...
::'''Zyanya:''' Haha, alright, just let me know whenever you’re ready to begin...

==Trivia==
* ''Zyanya'' is the wife of ''Mixtli'', the protagonist of the historical fiction novel ''{{w|Aztec_(novel)|Aztec}}'' by Gary Jennings. She's implied to be of {{w|Zapotec_civilization|Zapotec}} origin. In the novel, the author says the name means "forever."
* ''Zyanya'' is the name of a {{w|Zapotec_civilization|Zapotec}}-inspired character featured in the Mexican-American show ''{{w|Onyx_Equinox|Onyx Equinox}}''.
* It's believed that the name ''Zyanya'' could have roots in Zapotec or Aztec languages; although there are some phonetic discrepancies and a lack of evidence to confirm this.
